body_html:
@eaplatanios : We just released maven packages for 1.5.0-rc0, so I'm hoping your immediate need is met.

I'm tempted to defer setting up releases of Maven nightlies till there is a stronger, more consistent demand for them. Sound reasonable?
body_text:
@eaplatanios : We just released maven packages for 1.5.0-rc0, so I'm hoping your immediate need is met.
I'm tempted to defer setting up releases of Maven nightlies till there is a stronger, more consistent demand for them. Sound reasonable?
body:
@eaplatanios : We just released [maven packages for 1.5.0-rc0](https://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails%7Corg.tensorflow%7Cproto%7C1.5.0-rc0%7Cjar), so I'm hoping your immediate need is met.

I'm tempted to defer setting up releases of Maven nightlies till there is a stronger, more consistent demand for them. Sound reasonable?
